Command.CommandString: SELECT WCS_TASK.*,c1.CellName,S1.AisleNo,CMD_BillType.BillTypeName,product.ProductName,SectionName,Region.RegionName,Sys_TableState.StateDesc,c1.CellRow,c1.CellColumn,S1.ShelfValue FROM WCS_TASK left join CMD_Cell C1 on WCS_TASK.CellCode=C1.CellCode left join CMD_Shelf S1 On C1.ShelfCode=S1.ShelfCode left join CMD_BillType On CMD_BillType.BillTypeCode=WCS_TASK.BillTypeCode LEFT JOIN Sys_TableState on Sys_TableState.TableName='WCS_TASK' and Sys_TableState.FieldName='State' and WCS_TASK.State=Sys_TableState.State left join CMD_ProductDetail detail on wcs_task.PalletCode=detail.ProductCode and wcs_task.SectionID=detail.RowID left join CMD_Product product on detail.ProductCode=product.ProductCode left join CMD_Region Region on wcs_task.RegionCode=region.RegionCode where {0} ORDER BY WCS_TASK.TaskID , WCS_TASK.TaskNo

SELECT Top {2} WCS_TASK.*,C1.CellRow,S1.AisleNo,S1.AisleValue, (case when WCS_TASK.TaskType='11' then '001'+S1.AisleValue+dbo.PadLeft(cast(WCS_TASK.RowIndex AS varchar),'0',3) else '002'+S1.AisleValue+dbo.PadLeft(cast(C1.CellRow AS varchar),'0',3) end) FromStation, (case when WCS_TASK.TaskType='11' then '002'+S1.AisleValue+dbo.PadLeft(cast(C1.CellRow AS varchar),'0',3) else '001'+S1.AisleValue+dbo.PadLeft(cast(WCS_TASK.RowIndex AS varchar),'0',3) end) ToStation, C1.InDate FROM WCS_TASK left join CMD_Cell C1 on WCS_TASK.CellCode=C1.CellCode left join CMD_Shelf S1 On C1.ShelfCode=S1.ShelfCode Where {0} ORDER BY {1}

SELECT TASK.*,C1.CellRow,c1.CellColumn,C1.Depth, case when task.TaskType='11' then Aisle.InStationNo+substring(task.CellCode,7,3)+'1' else C1.CellAddress end as FromStation, case when task.TaskType='11' then C1.CellAddress else Aisle.OutStationNo+substring(task.CellCode,7,3)+'1' end as ToStation FROM WCS_TASK TASK left join CMD_Cell C1 on TASK.CellCode=C1.CellCode left join CMD_Shelf S1 On C1.ShelfCode=S1.ShelfCode left join CMD_Aisle Aisle on s1.AisleNo=Aisle.AisleNo Where {0} ORDER BY WCS_TASK.TaskID , WCS_TASK.TaskNo

SELECT Top {2} TASK.*, C1.CellRow,c1.CellColumn,C1.Depth, case when task.TaskType='11' then S.Instation else case when S1.AisleNo='01' then s.AisleNoStaion1 else s.AisleNoStaion2 end end as FromStation, case when task.TaskType='11' then case when S1.AisleNo='01' then s.AisleNoStaion1 else s.AisleNoStaion2 end else case when task.SectionID=(select MAX(RowID) from CMD_ProductDetail where ProductCode=task.PalletCode) then s.OutStation2 else s.OutStation1 end end as ToStation FROM WCS_TASK TASK left join CMD_Cell C1 on TASK.CellCode=C1.CellCode left join CMD_Shelf S1 On C1.ShelfCode=S1.ShelfCode left join CMD_Aisle Aisle on s1.AisleNo=Aisle.AisleNo cross join cmd_AGVStation S Where S.Flag=1 and {0} ORDER BY {1}

SELECT CMD_Cell.*, CMD_Region.RegionName, CMD_Shelf.ShelfName,CMD_Shelf.Rows,CMD_Shelf.Columns,CMD_Shelf.ShelfValue,detail.SectionName,cmd_product.ProductName FROM CMD_Cell LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Region ON CMD_Region.RegionCode = CMD_Cell.RegionCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Shelf ON CMD_Cell.ShelfCode = CMD_Shelf.ShelfCode left join CMD_ProductDetail detail on cmd_cell.PalletBarCode=detail.ProductCode and detail.RowID=cmd_cell.SectionID left join CMD_Product on detail.ProductCode=CMD_Product.ProductCode order by CMD_Cell.CellCode
update Sys_TmpCode set TmpCode=@TmpCode,SysDate=@SysDate where RowIndex=@RowIndex
